actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 as amended to exclude from the requirement of registering as farm labor contractors certain farmers.
short_title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments

summary.text: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments - Amends the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exclude from the requirement of registering as farm labor contractors any farmer, processor, canner, ginner, packing shed operator, or nurseryman who recruits, solicits, hires, furnishes or transports migrant workers on behalf of a farmer whose farm is located within 25 miles, and who receives no monetary consideration (other than reimbursement of actual expenses incurred) for engaging in such activity.

titles.title: Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act Amendments
A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 as amended to exclude from the requirement of registering as farm labor contractors certain farmers.
